userstyles.title: Userstyles
userstyles.description: All userstyles in the Catppuccin org.

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: The categories that fit the userstyle the most, the first category is the primary category which the userstyle will be listed under on the README.

link.title: Website Link
link.description: The hyperlink of the website that is being themed.

color.title: Color
color.description: The fill color for the icon on the Catppuccin website, which should match the color used by Simple Icons. If the icon does not exist in Simple Icons, choose the most suitable color from the branding.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: The icon to use on the website. This should be the same name as the SVG file on https://simpleicons.org/. If a `.svg` suffix is present, it's taken from the local website repository resources.

alias.title: Alias
alias.description: If another website can be themed with this userstyle, provide the name of the other website here (e.g. `anilist` for `anichart`, where AniChart can be themed with the same CSS applied in AniList.)

note.title: Note
note.description: An additional note for the Usage section of the userstyle README.

current-maintainers.title: Current Maintainers
current-maintainers.description: List of all active maintainers for this userstyle.

past-maintainers.title: Past Maintainers
past-maintainers.description: List of all users that have maintained this userstyle in the past.

collaborators.title: All Collaborators
collaborators.description: Represents all maintainers and contributors to all userstyles.
The GitHub username of the collaborator.

categories.description: The categories that fit the port the most, the first category is the primary category which the port will be listed under on the README.
